org.forgerock.openam.audit.context

Class ExecutorServiceConfigurator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.openam.audit.context.ExecutorServiceConfigurator

  • public class ExecutorServiceConfigurator
extends Object
    Exposes aspects of a wrapped ThreadPoolExecutor's configuration. {Alink ExecutorService} decorators can choose to expose instances of this class rather than breaking encapsulation of the ExecutorService that they wrap.
    Since:
    13.0.0

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructs a new ExecutorServiceConfigurator.

      • setKeepAliveTime

        public void setKeepAliveTime(long time,
                             TimeUnit unit)
        Sets the time limit for which threads may remain idle before being terminated.
        Parameters:
        time - the time to wait. A time value of zero will cause excess threads to terminate immediately after executing tasks.
        unit - the time unit of the time argument
        See Also:
        ThreadPoolExecutor.setKeepAliveTime(long, TimeUnit)

      • getKeepAliveTime

        public long getKeepAliveTime(TimeUnit unit)
        Returns the thread keep-alive time.
        Parameters:
        unit - the desired time unit of the result
        Returns:
        the time limit
        See Also:
        ThreadPoolExecutor.getKeepAliveTime(TimeUnit)
